Text: Awesome idea, dude.  Maybe once Blackest Night is over, you can put together a pack for those stories as well.

.CBR / .CBZ are simply .RAR / .ZIP files with a renamed extension.

Change the extension back to .zip or .rar, extract the files, delete the ads, re-zip/re-rar it then rename the extension to .cbr/.cbz
